subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Usain Bolt ran the fastest 200 meters of the season, in 19.73 seconds, at the Areva Diamond League meet in Paris, shaving 0.01 of a second off the previous best time.
snippet: Usain Bolt ran the fastest 200 meters of the season, in 19.73 seconds, at the Areva Diamond League meet in Paris, shaving 0.01 of a second off the previous best time.
